title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 2353 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
July 31, 2018
On Tuesday, July 31, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 2353, the “Strengthening Career and Technical Education for the 21st Century Act,” which reauthorizes and modifies existing programs for career and technical education.
